- After version 3.x, old plugins will no longer be available.
  They will be automatically deleted upon upgrade.
  Please visit the plugin repository to download and install the new versions.
  If the plugin developers have not yet updated their plugins, please contact them to request an upgrade.

- enable dev tools
- add database api for plugin
